ambient: Laboratory setting. Sounds of bubbling chemicals, possible explosion 'BOOM' sound effect. Atmosphere of scientific experimentation and revelation. | Sounds of 'BAM' and 'POP' are illustrated, indicating energy and activity. Setting is a school environment, with classrooms visible. Atmosphere is high-energy and anticipation. | The scene is set in a science lab. There are beakers and scientific equipment visible in the background. The atmosphere feels experimental, hinting at both intellectual curiosity and potential danger. | School environment with a tree. Atmosphere of determination and anticipation.

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.text: [calm] Taiju is determined to confess his love for Yuzuriha. He is standing in front of his school, bursting with energy. Senku is present but only seen from the back, apparently in a science lab with other students.

dialogue.speaker: Taiju
dialogue.text: [determined] [excited] THERE'S NO STOPPING ME! IT'S GOTTA BE TODAY!!

dialogue.speaker: Senku
dialogue.text: [irritated] [shouts] LISTEN UP, SENKU !!

dialogue.speaker: Taiju
dialogue.text: [sentimental] [softly] AFTER FIVE LONG YEARS OF HAVING FEELINGS FOR YUZURIHA...

dialogue.speaker: Taiju
dialogue.text: [determined] [excited] ...I'M FINALLY GONNA CONFESS MY LOVE!!

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.text: [calm] Senku is working in his science lab, and Taiju is observing him, initially impressed but quickly growing skeptical about what Senku is doing. They are indoors in a lab-like setting.

dialogue.speaker: Senku
dialogue.text: [sarcastic] [matter-of-factly] I'LL BE CHEERING FOR YOU SO HARD FROM HERE IN THE SCIENCE LAB THAT MY VOCAL CORDS'LL SNAP.

dialogue.speaker: Senku
dialogue.text: [curious] HM [short pause] INTERESTING... VERRRY INTERESTING.

dialogue.speaker: Taiju
dialogue.text: [confused] WAIT, SO WHICH IS IT?!

dialogue.speaker: Taiju
dialogue.text: [frustrated] A FOOL WHO TAKES FIVE WHOLE YEARS TO SAY ANYTHING IS THE EPITOME OF ABSURDITY.

dialogue.speaker: Senku
dialogue.text: [irritated] [softly] SILENCE. I WON'T CHEER EVEN ONE MILLIMETER FOR YOU, YOU BIG OAF.

dialogue.speaker: Taiju
dialogue.text: [sarcastic] [playfully] OH YEAH? THANKS, Senku!

dialogue.speaker: Senku
dialogue.text: [smug] ALLOW ME TO PROVIDE A METHOD SO RATIONAL IT'LL KILL YOU.

dialogue.speaker: Senku
dialogue.text: [confident] THIS WILL SEND YOUR PHEROMONE PRODUCTION INTO OVERDRIVE.

dialogue.speaker: Senku
dialogue.text: [neutral] BASICALLY, IT'S A LOVE POTION.

dialogue.speaker: Senku
dialogue.text: [confident] YOUR SUCCESS IS TEN BILLION PERCENT ASSURED IF YOU DRINK THIS!

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.text: [calm] Taiju refuses Senku's science experiment and decides to confess his love to Yuzuriha under the camphor tree.

dialogue.speaker: Senku
dialogue.text: [neutral] [slightly dismissive] THANKS, SENKU, BUT...

dialogue.speaker: Senku
dialogue.text: [dismissive] ...NO THANKS!

dialogue.speaker: Taiju
dialogue.text: [frustrated] [determined] I CAN'T GO AND CHEAT MY WAY INTO HER HEART.

dialogue.speaker: Taiju
dialogue.text: [determined] [confident] THAT'S RIGHT. LIKE THE HONEST AND UPRIGHT DUDE I AM...

dialogue.speaker: Taiju
dialogue.text: [determined] ...I TOLD YUZURIHA TO MEET ME UNDER THE CAMPHOR TREE.

dialogue.speaker: Taiju
dialogue.text: [determined] [excited] THAT'S WHERE I'LL CONFESS!!

dialogue.speaker: Narrator
dialogue.text: [calm] Senku reveals that the 'love potion' was just ordinary gasoline made from plastic bottle caps, much to the shock of Taiju and others, while Senku smirks to himself.

dialogue.speaker: Taiju
dialogue.text: [confused] HUH?

dialogue.speaker: Taiju
dialogue.text: [confused] I DUN GEDDIT.

dialogue.speaker: Taiju
dialogue.text: [fearful] [worried] SO Taiju WOULD'VE DIED IF HE DRANK IT?

dialogue.speaker: Senku
dialogue.text: [calm] IT'S MERELY LONG GASOLINE MOLECULES CHOPPED UP BY A FEW HYDROCARBONS. SIMPLE ENOUGH TO UNDERSTAND.

dialogue.speaker: Senku
dialogue.text: [sarcastic] [yells] JUST THINK ABOUT THE ATOMIC STRUCTURE OF POLY-ETHYLENE, YOU FOOLS!

dialogue.speaker: Taiju
dialogue.text: [shocked] WAS THAT REALLY A LOVE POTION, Senku...?

dialogue.speaker: Senku
dialogue.text: [calm] OF COURSE NOT. IT'S JUST ORDINARY GASOLINE. I PRODUCED IT FROM PLASTIC BOTTLE CAPS.

dialogue.speaker: Senku
dialogue.text: [smug] HEH HEH... [short pause] I WAS TEN BILLION PERCENT SURE HE WOULDN'T DRINK IT.

dialogue.speaker: Senku
dialogue.text: [amused] HE'S AN HONEST FOOL.
